definitions: a brown carbonated drink that is flavored with an extract of cola nuts, or with a similar flavoring
shortDefinitions: brown carbonated drink that is flavoured with extract of cola nuts, or with similar flavouring

definitions: a small evergreen African tree which is cultivated in the tropics for its seeds (cola nuts).

notes.text: Genus Cola, family Sterculiaceae: several species, in particular C. acuminata

shortDefinitions: small evergreen African tree which is cultivated in tropics for its seeds
